rows.label: tev056301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bodada about his work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Bodada if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Friend wants to know occupation of Bodada?
What for?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0002
rows.name: Almost all Nopon jobs related to selling things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0003
rows.name:
True businessnopon willing to do whatever it takes to
make sale, whether that mean tunneling underwater,
jumping off cliff, or traveling to ends of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Also, Nopon never turn customers away.
Nopon sell to anyone and everyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0009
rows.name:
*whisper murmur* ...need to watch out for Nopon
who look tired or floppy or gloomy or mopey...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0010
rows.name:
...Huh? Friend want to know what Bodada sells?
Meh! Friend should know better than to ask![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0011
rows.name:
All friend needs to know is that Nopon have their
limits. So when ugly xenos attack and business starts
to go south, Nopon get frustrated![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0012
rows.name:
Nopon need to find ways to let off steam.
We no different from human friends in this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Bodada about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Ooh! Bodada really likes idea from Zazazan.
So how about this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0014
rows.name:
We can shape pot stickers to look like Bodada!
Then Bodada become face of brand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0015
rows.name:
Bodada will be all over packaging and posters!
Someone could even make Bodada plushie![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0016
rows.name:
...Ooh, and maybe one day they build Bodabodaland
right here in Mira. Time to dream big![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Friend was big help in aiding Bodada and Zazazan
with sneaking cargo right under snooty nose of Loma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0021
rows.name:
This time Bodada really pull wool over eyes.
Foolish Loma will never suspect goods were brought
in with help of mighty BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0022
rows.name:
...Hmm? Friend wants to know what is inside?
Friend should know better than to ask! Meh-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev056301_MSG0023
rows.name:
All friend needs to know is that we are partners now.
Soon friend will be filthy rich just like Bodada and
Zazazan![ST:wait ]
